#Text= Aang says : " Please , I do n't normally play this card , but ... I 'm the Avatar .

column1: #Text=Just hear us out .
#Text=" Zuko says : " My name is Zuko , Crown Prince of the Fire Nation .
#Text=O - or at least I used to be .
#Text=I know my people have distorted the ways of firebending , to be fueled by anger and rage .
#Text=But now I want to learn the true way , the original way .
#Text=When we came here , I never imagined the Sun Warrior 's civilization was secretly alive .
#Text=I am truly humbled to be in your presence .
#Text=Please , teach us .
#Text=" Sun Warrior chief says : " If you wish to learn the ways of the Sun , you must learn them from the masters , Ran and Shaw .
#Text=" Aang says : " Ran and Shaw ?
#Text=There are two of them ?
#Text=" Sun Warrior chief says : " When you present yourself to them , they will examine you .
#Text=They 'll read your hearts , your souls , and your ancestry .
#Text=If they deem you worthy , they 'll teach you .
#Text=If they do n't , you 'll be destroyed on the spot .
#Text="
